title: SOLD: 1911 Hugh Jennings' Auto Accident Postcard
author: Kris19

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1911 Hugh Jennings' Auto Accident Postcard
posts.post_content:
Printed postcard depicting Hughie Jennings' car that ran off a bridge in Gouldsboro, PA in December 1911.  Odd event to commemorate with a postcard!  

Very nice condition, with light corner wear and a light 1/2" wrinkle on the left edge, mostly visible from the back.  Back is clean.  

SOLD delivered net to me, payment by PayPal preferred.

Please PM me or email [url]kris.sweckard@sbcglobal.net[/url]

Thanks!
